name: Awesome Testimonials
author: Prakash

sections.description:
Awesome Testimonial Plugin for WordPress built to display testimonials, client quotes or reviews with variety styles on any post, page, custom template, widget, etc

A FEW FEATURES ARE

  • Fade, Crossfade, Scroll, Cover, and Uncover effects
  • Widget Ready
  • With just a shortcode, create a list page for testimonial
  • Mobile-Friendly and Responsive – Simple to Customize
  • Simple to Use
  • Start ratings are available

Rate The Plugin

  • I’d love to hear from you!
sections.installation:
1. Upload Awesome_Testimonial.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [pra_testimonial] in your Pages.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • March. 03, 2015 – v1.0.0
  • Released Plugin

2.0.0

  • May. 03, 2015 – v2.0.0
  • New Feature added (Start Ratings | Designation )
  • Fixed problem with shortcode to display testimonial any place on website.

2.2.0

  • August. 29, 2020 – v2.2.0
  • New Feature added (Define background color )
  • Fixed problem of effect dropdown, Improved version

2.2.1

  • August. 1, 2022 – v2.2.1
  • Improved features
  • Bug Fixed
